fields.description:
h2. Request

Note, Marshall asked me to raise this.

Currently, calendar permissions must be explicitly configured in tiapp.xml in order to access the calendar.

Just as is done for other APIs, add permissions automatically during the build process.
fields.summary: Android: Calendar - automatically add necessary permissions to tiapp.xml

comments.body: This is invalid, but might be edge case covered by TIMOB-19933
